articles.title: Spring Boot 4.0: Cloud-Native by Default with GraalVM Support
articles.description: Spring Boot 4.0 is officially released with native GraalVM support, instant startup times, and built-in observability. The framework is now fully optimized for cloud-native microservices.
articles.author: Josh Long

articles.title: Critical Security Flaw in Spring Security 6.x (CVE-2025-5678)
articles.description: A critical authentication bypass vulnerability has been found in Spring Security 6.0 to 6.2. Immediate update to version 6.2.3+ is required to prevent unauthorized access.
articles.author: Eugen Paraschiv

articles.title: Spring Framework 7: Reactive Programming Gets Major Upgrade
articles.description: Spring Framework 7 brings revolutionary changes to reactive programming with Project Reactor 4, virtual threads support, and improved WebFlux performance. Backward compatibility maintained.
articles.author: John Thompson

articles.title: Spring Data JPA : Optimisation des requêtes N+1
articles.description: Guide complet pour résoudre les problèmes de performance liés aux requêtes N+1 dans Spring Data JPA. Découvrez EntityGraph, JOIN FETCH et les projections DTO.
articles.author: Jean-Baptiste Nizet

articles.title: Spring for GraphQL 2.0: Better Than REST?
articles.description: Spring for GraphQL 2.0 brings first-class GraphQL support with automatic schema generation, subscription support, and seamless Spring Security integration. Is it time to move from REST?
articles.author: Rossen Stoyanchev

articles.title: Integration Testing with Spring Boot and Testcontainers
articles.description: Master integration testing in Spring Boot using Testcontainers. Learn how to test with real databases, message brokers, and external services in isolated Docker containers.
articles.author: Petri Kainulainen

articles.title: Production-Ready Spring Boot with Actuator and Prometheus
articles.description: Complete guide to monitoring Spring Boot applications in production using Actuator, Micrometer, Prometheus, and Grafana. Health checks, metrics, and alerting best practices.
articles.author: Thorben Janssen

articles.title: Spring Modulith: Modular Monoliths Made Easy
articles.description: Spring Modulith helps you build well-structured modular monoliths with strong module boundaries, event-driven communication, and documentation generation. Better than microservices?
articles.author: Oliver Drotbohm
